## Labels.prepareDefault() function

Prepares the given language's default label set for insertion into a disk image as a `STR#` resource.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function prepareDefault(lang: Language): Buffer;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  lang | <code>Language</code> | The language to prepare the label set for. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Buffer`

A `Buffer` in `STR#` format.

## Remarks

Throws [NoDefaultLabelsError](./dmg-license.nodefaultlabelserror.md) if there is no default label set for the given language.

Throws [LabelEncodingError](./dmg-license.labelencodingerror.md) if there is a problem encoding some of the labels.

Throws a  if there is more than one error.
